commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
{
  "name": "zod-to-from",
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "description": "A collection of to/from adapters that convert between I/O formats and Zod-validated objects",
  "repository": "unjs/zod-to-from",
  "license": "MIT",
  "sideEffects": false,
  "type": "module",
  "exports": {
    ".": "./dist/index.mjs"
  },
  "types": "./dist/index.d.mts",
  "files": [
    "dist"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "build": "obuild",
    "dev": "vitest dev",
    "lint": "eslint . && prettier -c .",
    "lint:fix": "automd && eslint . --fix && prettier -w .",
    "prepack": "pnpm build",
    "release": "pnpm test && changelogen --release && npm publish && git push --follow-tags",
    "test": "pnpm lint && pnpm test:types && vitest run --coverage",
    "test:types": "tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "zod": "^3.23.8"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/node": "^24.3.0",
    "@vitest/coverage-v8": "^3.2.4",
    "automd": "^0.4.0",
    "changelogen": "^0.6.2",
    "eslint": "^9.33.0",
    "eslint-config-unjs": "^0.5.0",
    "obuild": "^0.2.1",
    "prettier": "^3.6.2",
    "typescript": "^5.9.2",
    "vitest": "^3.2.4"
  },
  "packageManager": "pnpm@10.15.0"
}
